Hello!

I'm Treasure

(Why yes, that is my real name)

I'm a Portland-based web developer who loves using Vue.js and React to make beautiful things.

My most recent gig was to research, script and perform killer JavaScript content at Treehouse. I worked closely with designers and animators to create some of the most popular and highly rated courses in the Treehouse library.

In my spare time I like to travel, sing karaoke (Tina Turner is my go-to) and volunteer at The Maybelle Center.
